Package com.coherentsolutions.yaf.slack

Class SlackService

java.lang.Object
com.coherentsolutions.yaf.slack.SlackService
@Service @ConditionalOnProperty(name="yaf.slack.enabled", havingValue="true") public class SlackService extends Object
The type Slack service.

  • Method Details

    • publishReport

      @EventListener public void publishReport(ExecutionReportReadyEvent event)
      Listens for the execution report ready event and publishes the report to Slack if the Slack report feature is enabled.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that contains the execution report to be published.

    • chatPostMessage

      public com.slack.api.methods.response.chat.ChatPostMessageResponse chatPostMessage(com.slack.api.methods.request.chat.ChatPostMessageRequest chatPostMessageRequest, String channelId)
      Sends a chat message to a Slack channel using the provided chat post message request and channel ID.
      Parameters:
      chatPostMessageRequest - The request object containing the message details to be posted to Slack.
      channelId - The ID of the Slack channel where the message will be posted.
      Returns:
      A ChatPostMessageResponse object containing the response from the Slack API, or null if an error occurs while attempting to send the message.

    • chatPostMessage

      public com.slack.api.methods.response.chat.ChatPostMessageResponse chatPostMessage(com.slack.api.methods.request.chat.ChatPostMessageRequest chatPostMessageRequest)
      Sends a chat message to a Slack channel using the provided chat post message request.
      Parameters:
      chatPostMessageRequest - The request object containing the message details to be posted to Slack.
      Returns:
      A ChatPostMessageResponse object containing the response from the Slack API, or null if an error occurs while attempting to send the message.

    • sendWebHookMessage

      public com.slack.api.webhook.WebhookResponse sendWebHookMessage(com.slack.api.webhook.Payload payload)
      Sends a webhook message to Slack using the provided payload.
      Parameters:
      payload - The payload containing the message details to be sent via the Slack webhook.
      Returns:
      A WebhookResponse object containing the response from the Slack webhook, or null if an error occurs while attempting to send the message.
